item.title: Iptables notes
item.description: Iptables # One of the utility firewall developed for Linux systems is iptables. How iptables Work # Network traffic is made up of packets. Data is broken up into smaller pieces (called packets), sent over a network, then put back together.

item.title: more vs less vs most
item.description: more vs less vs most # There is an old joke consisting of three words: “less is more”. (This is the “pun” referred to by guillermo chamorro’s second comment to the question.
